com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Class EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options.SelectedOptionIterableBuilderSupport
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options.EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionIterableBuilder

    public class EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder
extends SelectedOptionIterableBuilderSupport
    Generates OptionFormElementBuilders for a particular entity type, where the list of options is fetched through an EntityQueryExecutor and custom EntityQuery. By default an EntityQuery without parameters will be used, resulting in all entities being returned.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Detail

      • forEntityConfiguration

        public static EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder forEntityConfiguration(EntityConfiguration entityConfiguration)
        Creates an EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder for all entities of a particular EntityConfiguration. By default the current entity being treated will not be provided as an option.
        Parameters:
        entityConfiguration - whose options to select
        Returns:
        option builder

      • setSelfOptionIncluded

        public void setSelfOptionIncluded(boolean selfOptionIncluded)
        In case of options that are the same type as the entity being built, should the entity itself be provided as an option. Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        selfOptionIncluded - True when entity itself should be included.
